001package tv.freewheel.ad.interfaces;
002
003import android.view.ViewGroup;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005
006/**
007 * ISlot is the base Ad placement unit, which is used to play the ads.
008 */
009public interface ISlot {
010        /**
011         *      Get custom id of the slot.
012         *
013         *      @return custom id of the slot
014         */
015        public String getCustomId();
016        
017        /**
018         *      Get type of the slot.
019         *
020         *      @return type of the slot, the value can be one of:
021         *              <p>       SLOT_TYPE_TEMPORAL
022         *              <p>       SLOT_TYPE_VIDEOPLAYER_NONTEMPORAL
023         *              <p>       SLOT_TYPE_SITESECTION_NONTEMPORAL
024         */
025        public int getType();
026        
027        /**
028         *      Get time position of the slot.
029         *
030         *      @return time position of the slot
031         */
032        public double getTimePosition();
033        
034        /**
035         *      Get time position class.
036         *
037         *      @return time position class of the slot, the value can be one of:
038         *              <p>       TIME_POSITION_CLASS_PREROLL
039         *              <p>       TIME_POSITION_CLASS_MIDROLL
040         *              <p>       TIME_POSITION_CLASS_POSTROLL
041         *              <p>       TIME_POSITION_CLASS_OVERLAY
042         *              <p>       TIME_POSITION_CLASS_DISPLAY
043         *              <p> TIME_POSITION_CLASS_PAUSE_MIDROLL
044         */
045        public int getTimePositionClass();
046
047        /**
048         *      Get the duration of the embedded ads.
049         *
050         *      @return the duration of embedded ads, -1 if unavailable
051         */
052        public double getEmbeddedAdsDuration();
053
054        /**
055         *  Get the end time position of the slot.
056         *
057         *  @return the end time position of the temporal slot, -1 if unavailable
058         */
059        public double getEndTimePosition();
060        
061        /**
062         *      Get width of the slot.
063         *
064         *      @return width in device-independent pixels
065         */
066        public int getWidth();
067        
068        /**
069         *      Get height of the slot.
070         *
071         *      @return height in device-independent pixels
072         */
073        public int getHeight();
074        
075        /**
076         *      Get slot display base object, the ad will be drawn on the base. <br/>
077         *
078         *      @return the ViewGroup object. For Temporal Slot it is a FrameLayout, for nonTemporal Slot it is a RelativeLayout. If failed to create slotBase will return null
079         */
080        public ViewGroup getBase();
081        
082        /**
083         *      Play the slot.
084         */
085        public void play();
086        
087        /**
088         *      Preload the slot.
089         */
090        public void preload();
091        
092        /**
093         *      Stop the slot.
094         */
095        public void stop();
096        
097        /**
098         *      Pause the slot.
099         */
100        public void pause();
101        
102        /**
103         *      Resume the slot.
104         */
105        public void resume();
106        
107        /**
108         *      Set the parameters at slot level.
109         *
110         *      @param  name    key of the parameter to be set
111         *      @param  value   value for the key
112         */
113        public void setParameter(String name, Object value);
114        
115        /**
116         *      Get duration of the slot.
117         *
118         *      @return a number in seconds, which is greater than or equal to 0
119         */
120        public double getTotalDuration();
121        
122        /**
123         *      Get playheadTime of the slot.
124         *
125         *      @return a number in seconds, which is greater than or equal to 0
126         */
127        public double getPlayheadTime();
128
129        /**
130         * Get all ad instances in the slot. Only for player use.
131         *
132         * @return ArrayList of ad instances
133         */
134        public ArrayList<IAdInstance> getAdInstances();
135}
